lead_paragraph: ISRAEL--Deborah. Longtime resident of Glen Cove, NY. Wife of the late, Leo, adored mother of Fred, Steve (Marsee), Michael (Michele), and David (Lucretia). Most loved grandmother of Isa, Samantha, Jake, Harrison, Sam, Sarah, Blake, William, and Daniel. Service Sunday, 9:00am, at Gutterman's 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, NY. Interment to follow at Washington Memorial Park, Coram, NY. 1/3
